item.description:
WEST’s Alternative Careers for Scientists & Engineers
When: Thursday, February 10, from 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Where: Microsoft NERD Center, Cambridge, MA
Host: Women Entrepreneurs in Science and Technology (WEST)
Website : www.WESTorg.org
If you are exploring your options, leaving your job, or want to learn more about career choices, come and meet an extensive panel of "One-Night Mentors" who have successful careers outside of academia in fields such as business development, patent law, consulting, communications, project management, and much more. Following brief introductions, mentors will be available at separate tables for "speed networking" where you can talk with them and learn more about their careers and the choices they made. Light dinner and refreshments included. This event is open to the public - everyone is welcome to attend!
item.name: WEST’s Alternative Careers for Scientists & Engineers
